nodes.text: Meeting Room A3000291 was a conference room in the Senate Building. The room was panelled with rare laroon wood.

In 24 BBY, Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Siri Tachi, and Ferus Olin met with Galactic Senate aide Tyro Caladian in this room to learn of the legal complications of pursuing the scientist Jenna Zan Arbor to the Mid-Rim world of Romin.
